title: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, June 4, 2013
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, June 4, 2013
description: The Obama administration slaps Iran with fresh trade sanctions in its ongoing effort to halt Tehran's nuclear program. The new penalties are likely to hit Iran's currency and its car market. A fight over oil tax cuts in Alaska heats up. And New York City's 57th street is becoming an 'it-place' for hedge fund titans and other global executives to buy castles in the sky.
byline: Shannon Mullen, Sally Herships, Mitchell Hartman, Kasra Naji, Bruce Johnson, Molly Wood, Mark Garrison, David Brancaccio and Johnny Niemann
teaser: The Obama administration slaps Iran with fresh trade sanctions in its ongoing effort to halt Tehran's nuclear program. The new penalties are likely to hit Iran's currency and its car market. A fight over oil tax cuts in Alaska heats up. And New York City's 57th street is becoming an 'it-place' for hedge fund titans and other global executives to buy castles in the sky.
